description.p: Project leader and developer for physics- and data-based prediction software.

bulletedlist.item: Leveraged industry contacts to secure software licenses and access open-source solutions, accelerating the modeling program timeline by five years and saving \$1MM in development costs.
Principal investigator on research developing methods to compare open-source drill string models.

Developed a generalized Python library to analyze and plot high-frequency time-series data. The library includes signal processing algorithms, finite-precision arithmetic mathematics, automatic units handling, and a separation-of-concerns design. Reduced code-writing effort by 70-95\%.
Developed a C# and .NET MAUI application for converting data formats and units.
Reduced data summarization and report writing time by 95\% by designing LLM prompts to automate document summarization and content extraction.
Managed projects using internal and external teams.
Mentored and guided software developers and researchers.
